Package almost.functional.reactive

Package includes rudimentary reactive style code.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Observer<T> An Observer implementation that observes data, errors, and the completion of what is being observed.
 

Class Summary
BroadcastObserver<T> A single Observer that allow for multiple Observers to observe a single event.
Promise<T> A Promise is a composite of a Supplier and an Observer allowing for observation or the supplier.
 

Enum Summary
Promise.State The current state of the promise.
 

Package almost.functional.reactive Description

Package includes rudimentary reactive style code. Reactive code inverts traditionally pull based operations like iteration and stream reading to a more functional push based approach.
